purpose: To provide guidelines and a framework for developing LLM-powered applications that are reliable and production-ready.
principle: Adheres to the 12-factor app methodology, emphasizing modularity, scalability, and maintainability in LLM application design.
reusability: Designed for modular integration and extensibility, supporting various LLMs and orchestration patterns.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and features compared to mature frameworks.
name: 12-factor-agents
description: What are the principles we can use to build LLM-powered software that is actually good enough to put in the hands of production customers?
highlight: A framework for building robust LLM-powered applications with a focus on 12-factor principles.
